title: Cannot build Quarkus extension anymore after upgrading from 2.2.3.Final to 2.3.1.Final or later
body:
### Describe the bug

I'm the author of [JobRunr](https://github.com/jobrunr/jobrunr), a distributed job scheduler which integrates with Quarkus.

During monthly maintenance, I try to update all the dependencies of JobRunr. When I try upgrading Quarkus from 2.2.3.Final to 2.3.1.Final or later, my extension will not build anymore with the following exception (I'm using gradle).

Execution failed for task ':framework-support:jobrunr-quarkus-extension:tests:quarkusGenerateCode'.
> Could not resolve all dependencies for configuration ':framework-support:jobrunr-quarkus-extension:tests:quarkusDeploymentConfiguration'.


### Expected behavior

Build succeeds

### Actual behavior

Build fails

### How to Reproduce?

1. Checkout https://github.com/jobrunr/jobrunr
2. Do a global search in the IDE for '**2.2.3.Final**' (latest working version) and replace with **'2.4.0.Final'**.
3. Run the ./gradlew build (**or a lot faster:** use the gradle plugin of the IDE to build everything under :framework-support:jobrunr-quarkus-extension)

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux rdehuyss-laptop 5.11.0-37-generic #41~20.04.2-Ubuntu SMP Fri Sep 24 09:06:38 UTC 2021 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.11" 2021-04-20 OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 11.0.11+9-Ubuntu-0ubuntu2.20.04) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 11.0.11+9-Ubuntu-0ubuntu2.20.04, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.3.1.Final / 2.4.0.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
